mapper.select: select * from ( select row_number() over(order by physical_no desc) as rnum ,physical_no,height,weight,to_char(today,'YYYY.MM.DD') as today,user_id as user_Id ,round(weight/(height*height/10000),2) as bmiValue from physical_info where user_id=#{user_id} ) where rnum between #{pb.startRowNumber} and #{pb.endRowNumber}
select count(*) from physical_info where user_id=#{value} order by physical_no desc

select a.* from (select row_number() over(order by nickname desc) rnum, f.trainer_id as id,m.name from health_member m,following f where f.user_id=#{USERID} and f.trainer_id=m.id and apply_result='Y') a where rnum between #{STARTROWNUM} and #{ENDROWNUM}
